cards.header: Mbega nokoresha gute Navigateur ya Internet atangorane?

cards.text:
## Muriki cirwa muraza kwiga:  
• Ingene abatanga imihora ya Internet bita Fournisseurs d'Acces Internet mururimi rwigifaransa bakora  
• Ingene ikoresha ryawe ryama Naviguateur ricungerewe

Iyo har'umuntu ashaka kumviriza ihamagara ryawe rya terefone, agomba kuba afise umurongo wawe wa terefone canke inumero yuwo muriko muravugana ishobora kumuha gushika kumurongo wawe wa terefone. Hakoreshejwe internet birashoboka rero gufata umurongo uguhuza na internet canke mukwemeza umu (FAI)-- Fournisseur d'Acces Internet-- kugira cokimwe. Ibikorwa vyose birangurirwa kuri internet biva ku mashine yawe ya ordinateur birashobora kubikwa canke bikongera bikabonwa hakoreshejwe iryo tunganywa ry'ubuhinga bwo kunviriza imirongo y'amaterephone.

![Ingene FAI--Fournissseur d'Acces Internet--ikora](2.png)  
### Ingene  ikora  
Kumviriza ihamagara rya terefone canke umurongo wa Internet birasaba ubumenyi bumwe bumwe kandi bigakorwa mw'ibanga; kubishiramwo umu FAI nibisanzwe. Ibihugu vyinshi usanga bifise umu FAI umwe gusa, kandi kenshi baba batwarwa nintwaro yaho hantu.  
Ibihugu vyose birarekuriwe gushika ku muryango ushikana kuri internet. Uyu muryango rero ushobora kugururwa canke ukugarwa mukugenzura itanrwa rya internet mu gihugu kanaka. Ibintu vyose bikorerwa kuri internet bica ku rugero rw'igihugu rwigenzura rya internet, kandi ubwo rero umuntu arashobora kwibaza ko kugira igenzura kwitanrwa rya internet kugihugu bisigura ko bashobora kubona ibintu vyose bica kuri internet mubihugu vyose.

![Ingene ivyo bita ama cookies bisigara vyibitse mu mashine yawe ya Ordinateur](3.png)  
### Ingene ivyo bita ama cookies bisigara vyibitse mu mashine yawe ya ordinateur.  
Ibikorwa vyawe uba waranguriye kuri internet biribika kumirongo ya internet uba wagendeye hamwe no kumashine yawe canke iterephone. Imirongo myishi rero ya internet irasaba ko hajamwo ayo ma ''cookie.'' Iyo cookie rero itunganijwe kugira ibike inkuru zimwe zimwe kuvyerekeye uwuriko arayikoresha. Nkakarorero, irashobora gusigarana igihugu uvamwo kugira ize kukwereka urupapuro ruhuriranye nigihugu cawe mugihe wogendera imirongo imwe imwe ya internet. Ikindi ishobora kubika n'imirongo itandukanye wagiye uracako kugira ushike kuruwo murongo wa intrernet, canke ibintu bimwe bimwe bikwereye biri mu mashine yawe ya ordinateur.  
Iyo umaze rero gukoresha navigateur ya internet nko mukiringo gishika ukwezi, ushobora gusanga ufise ama cookies arenga ijana ku mashine yawe. Iyo zishoboye kubonwa bishobora gutanga amakuru kubikwerekeye. Iyo cookie rero ishobora kuba icemezo cuko wagendeye umurongo uyu canke uriya wa internet. Birashoboka ko ama cookies ari kumashine yawe afutwa. Ushobora kuzifutira kuri navigateur yawe ya internet canke ukazifuta ubanje kuzirondera. Birashoboka kandi ko utunganya navigateur yawe ya internet kuburyo idashobora kuza iremera ama cookies. Ibi bishobora gutuma hari imirongo imwimwe ya internet bidakunda ko yuguruka ku mashine yawe ya ordinateur, ariko bikakurinda cane ko hari ama cookie yinjira.

# Kahise kivyagiye birakorwa kuri Naviguateur  
Naviguateur yawe itunganijwe kugira ize irabika ivyo wagiye urakora. Nimba uriko urayikoresha kubintu bikomeye, zimya itegurwa kuriyo naviguateur ryo kuza irabika ibintu hama unafute urwo rukurikirane rw'ivyo bintu vyose vya kera.  
Tegekanya gukoresha Naviguateur hakoreshejwe ''fenetre incognito'' kuri naviguateur ya Chrome, canke ''naviguation privee'' kuri Firefox.

![Ingene HTTP na HTTPS bikora](4.png)  
###Ingene HTTP na HTTPS bikora  
Gufuta urukurikirine rw'ivyakera wagiye urakorera kuri naviguateur yawe niyo ntambuko ya mbere mu gukoresha naviguateur ya Internet mumutekano. Imirongo myishi ya internet barashobora kuyijako hakoreshejwe itegurwa risanzwe rihari rya HTTP ridafise ya codage mururimi rw'igifaransa. Umurongo HTTP barashobora kuwumviriza, canke hakagira nabawujako kugira bahindure impapuro iyo naviguateur yoba iriko irarondera.  
HTTPS nínyishu nziza itanga umutekano kurusha HTTP. HTTPS iranyegeza impapuro ikongera ikagerageza kwitwararika ibintu bitatu: 1) abandi bantu ntibashobora kubona ibiri kurwo rupapuro rwa internet, 2) rupapuro  rwa internet ntirushobora guhindurwa nabandi bantu, kandi 3)  urupapuro ruba rwarungitswe niyo bita serveur yuwo murongo wa internet uba uri mukibanza ca URL.  
Ariko rero serveur yuwo murongo wa internet igomba kubanza guhindurwa kugira ishobore gukorana neza numurongo HTTPS imbere yuko uyikoresha. Nimba hari umurongo wa internet wagira urungikeko inkuru idasanzwe, banza urabe neza ko uriko ukoresha umurongo HTTPS. Nimba umurongo wa internet udashoboye gukorana na HTTPS, nturungike iyo nkuru idasanzwe.

![Bimwe bimwe kuvyerekeye ikoreshwa rya HTTPS](5.png)  
### Bimwe bimwe kuvyerekeye ikoreshwa rya HTTPS  
Ibintu bitatu vyo kuraba mukwemeza neza ko muri kurupapuro rwa HTTPS: 1) Umurongo wa URL utangurwa na https://, 2) hariho akamenyetso kigufuri mwitanguriro ry'imfuruka vyúmurongo bandikamwo umurongo wa internet imbere ya URL, hamwe na 3) umurongo wa URL/location uri mwibara rigaragara.  
Nimba uronse ikikugabisha kuvyerekeye ama certificats canke ukabona akamenyetso ka yagufuri kamenetse, ugomba guca utegekanya ko bimwe mubifasha gucungera urupapuro rwawe bitariko birakora neza. Ca uhamagara uwo bita umu webmaster wa wamurongo kugira akosore ico kibazo imbere yuko harikintu icarico cose gikomeye corungikwa kuruwo murongo.

![Imihora Itazwi](6.png)  
### Imihora Itazwi  
Imirongo itazwi ikoreshwa muguca hirya ni hono imirongo ya internet iba yarugawe n'intwaro canke na FAI. Iyi mihora ikureka ugakoresha Naviguateur mubwigenge kandi atawukuzi kurusha uko imirongo ya HTTPS yobikurekurira.  
Iyumvire urungikiye ikete umugenzi ukaritekera ahatandukanye, wandika aho rigiye hatandukanye kuri rimwe rimwe ryose. Ikete rizoca aho hantu hose hatandukanye mw'ibanga ridasanzwe. Ntanumwe mubarirungikiwe azomenya iyo ryazananye canke aho rigomba gushika ubwanyuma, ariko gusa aho ryazananye ubwambere naho rigomba kuja ubukurikira.  
Numuhora wa TOR umeze uko nyene. Uzoreka kumenyekanisha ko uri kumurongo hamwe nivyusaba vyose ko Naviguateur yogukorera. Abajejwe igendura ryikoreshwa rya Internet kuri FAI yawe canke kurugero rw'igihugu ntibazomenya ivyo usavye Naviguateur yawe aho bigiye, hamwe numurongo wa internet ntuzomenya aho iryo saba ryawe ribereye.  
TOR rero irashobora gukoreshwa kuma terephone ngendanwa akoresha ubuhinga bwa Android. Orbot na Orweb nubuhinga bubiri bukorera hamwe mugutanga Naviguateur idashobora kumenywa.

## IBINTU VYO KWIBUKA  
• Koresha HTTPS burigihe bishobotse.  
• Nimba wibaza ko naviguateur yawe ya internet ishobora kuba iriko irarabwa, koresha umuhora utazwi, nka TOR.  
• Zimya ama cookies.  
• Zimya ikibanza kijamwo urukurikirane rwívyo wagiye urakora kuri Naviguateur yawe ya internet.  
• Navigateur yawe ntakuyizera 100 kw'ijana ko icungerewe, nimba ari inkuru yobangamira ubuzima bw'umuntu, ntuyitangaze ukoresheje Naviguateur ya Internet.

cards.question: Mbega gukoresha Navigateur ya Internet vyonshira gute mu ngorane?

choices.text: Kubera ariko biba bisanzwe biteguye, FAI yanje- Fournisseur d'Acces Internet ishobora kuba ifise urukurikirane rwivyo nagiye ndakoresha kuriyo navigateur yanje.
Kubera ingene biba bisanzwe biteguwe, ama navigateurs ya internet aragumana urukurikirane rw'ivyo uba warayakoresheje.
Urukurikirane rw'ivyo mba narakoreye kuri Naviguateur yanje ya internet bishobora kubonwa n'abatware canke reta.

cards.question: Nubwahe buryo butandukanye nshobora gukurikiza mugukoresha Navigateur ya internet atangorane nimwe?

choices.text: Guzimya ikiza kirabika ivyo wakoreyemwo ubwambere bita "historique".
Gufuta ivyuba wayikoreyemwo ubwambere bita "historique" mururimi rw'igifaransa.
Koresha ako bita "fenetre incognito" kuri navigateur yitwa Chrome/ iyitwa naviguation privee kuri navigateur yitwa Firefox.
Ndazimya imashine mugihe mpejeje gukoresha navigateur ya internet.

cards.question: Mbega nakahe kamaro kimihora itazwi- reseau d'anonymat mururimi rw'igifaransa?

choices.text: Kwirinda icungerwa ry'ibikorwa vyanje bitandukanye ndahakorera.
Kuraba imirongo ya internet iba yarugawe.
Kwirinda ingene imirongo ya internet yoza irafata ivyarivyo vyose nza ndakoresha kuri navigateur yanje.

cards.question: Mbega womenya gute ko Navigateur yawe ya Internet yafashe umurongo ikoresheje HTTPS?

choices.text: Ndandika HTTPS imbere yuko nshiramwo umurongo uwariwo wese wa internet.
Hari akagufuri kagaragara mu mfuruka ya Naviguateur internet canke mukibanza kijamwo umurongo wa internet inyuma.

title: Ingene nokoresha ico bita Navigateur ya Internet atangorane nimwe
